thread.title: BRIEF-Crescent Point Energy Issues Statement To Address Cation Capital's Nomination Of 4 Candidates To Crescent Point's Board

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Crescent Point Energy Issues Statement To Address Cation Capital's Nomination Of 4 Candidates To Crescent Point's Board
text:
April 9 (Reuters) - Crescent Point Energy Corp:
* CRESCENT POINT ENERGY ISSUES STATEMENT TO ADDRESS CATION CAPITAL’S NOMINATION OF 4 CANDIDATES TO CRESCENT POINT’S BOARD
* YEAR PLAN ARE ON TRACK TO GROW PRODUCTION ON A PER SHARE BASIS WITHIN CASH FLOW
* URGES SHAREHOLDERS TO CAST THEIR VOTE ON WHITE PROXY CARD AND CONTINUE TO SUPPORT NOMINEES PUT FORTH BY CO
* AS PART OF ROBUST RENEWAL PROCESS, ALSO PLAN TO ADD AN ADDITIONAL NEW INDEPENDENT DIRECTOR IN 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
